entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:36 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
